alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leon County through 815 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Ralford Greenway, Apalachee Regional Park, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Chaires Crossroads, Lake Iamonia, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Baum, Maclay State Gardens, Killearn Lakes, Capitola, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Market District, Bradfordville, Winthrop Park, Tom Brown Park, Governors Square Mall and Pisgah Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
